website_summaries.verdict: This case is prettier than pictures show, but the design starts flaking off after time.
pros: It will keep your phone protected, won't hinder buttons and ports, and includes a kickstand
cons: It can turn yellowish with time

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and protective!
customer_reviews.text: This case is absolutely beautiful! It shows off my rose gold phone so nicely. I was looking for something clear and that offered great protection, and I definitely found it in this case. No screen protector needed as the lip on the case is enough to keep your screen off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase !
customer_reviews.text: This case is beautiful. I have the jet black iPhone 7 plus and i ordered the White Henna Mandala Floral case for it and it looks gorgeous , fits amazing , and adds color and design to my phone . It has a good grip and not slippery in your hands . It fits great and doesn't interfere with my screen protector. Definitely will be ordering more designs from this seller . I couldn't be happier and I have gotten a few compliments already for it . It also arrived on time and pretty fast . I love this case !
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. Feels great on the hand and looks very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Mayrela

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case! It's beautiful and very sturdy! I can't get over the quality of this case. I will definitely be buying again with different designs.
customer_reviews.author: T. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable with excellent Protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case! It's rubberized but hard at the same time. Flexible to put on your phone and hard to protect it from cracks and dropping it. Very slim and beautiful design. It shows off the original color of the phone and feels light and slim. Best case I've bought for such a good price. Will definitely buy again with different designs!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love how nice it looks and the fact that it's not at all bulky but it truly gets the job done! I just drop my phone facedown on gravel and my heart nearly shattered when I heard my screen brake into a million pieces. To my surprise when I took off the screen protector my screen was intact! This case it's amazing!! ❤️ Along with the awesome screen protector I got, it has truly save me tons of money and unnecessary hassle. Thank you so much for providing us with an affordable product of great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I got the mandala phone case almost a month ago and so far I LOVE IT! It's a beautiful case that fits my phone nicely and it feels good in my hands. Pushing the on/off button and the volume buttons is incredibly easy which I'm glad cause my last phone case it was very difficult! It is also easy to plug in my charger which also nice all in all I'd say if you're thinking about getting this case go for it! P.S I hope my pictures help anyone thinking about choosing the mandala design cause when I was choosing I saw no review pictures for it lol
customer_reviews.author: Randisue Bedenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Looks & feels great
customer_reviews.text: Edited November 14, 2017. I've had this case for 7 months now. The functionality is fantastic, it has protected my phone flawlessly. However, it is no longer clear & has greyed quite a bit. I am ordering another one. I still get compliments on this case. I like the way this feels in my hand. It feels like it is protecting my investment but doesn't take away from the beauty & functionality of the phone what-so-ever. I would buy again & totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this case
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this case!!! The 7 plus is a bulky phone and with an otter box it makes it even more awkward. But this case is super slim and light! Barely adds anything to the phone itself. I've used this case for almost two weeks now and the design on the back still looks perfect. Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it :D
customer_reviews.text: I had mixed emotions about this case because of all the reviews but I decided to go ahead and try it. The case protects all the right places while being lightweight. The design is on the outside of the case so it's bumpy which I didn't expect but I've had it for awhile and it hasn't come off or show any sign or wearing off. I would recommend this case to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ylemchata

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This case was way better than expected. I honestly just bought it because I liked the design. I didn't know it would be so durable and high quality. I love how it slightly curves around the edges so if your phone falls screen down, there's enough of a lifted buffer that it may not break the screen. It also came with a little stand I never knew I would ever use. I actually use it all the time now! This case seems thicker than other plastic cases I've had, but not bulky and easy to put on and remove. It just seems like a really high quality product and the designs are so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is really beautiful and it protects the iPhone well. Will buy similar ones again in the future. The only drawback is that it took longer for the pre-order to arrive than ordering it directly after its release...
customer_reviews.author: alyho

customer_reviews.title: ... my phone case for 2 months now and I love it! The design is beautiful and is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had my phone case for 2 months now and I love it! The design is beautiful and is not chipping or peeling and I'm surprised at how durable it is. I have dropped my phone dozens of times and my phone is still in perfect condition. I think this is the best phone case I have ever owned in the sense that it provides both style and protection and still keeps the slender profile of the iPhone 7 plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This case is so beautiful and stylish! It looks nice at the sides and back. There are 2 little holes on the left side too if you would like to hang a strap. The case is elastic and strong, fits right in your hand, not slippery, not sticky. The only thing I would like it to change is that the print should be inside rather than outside. Not so sure if the print will come off upon long-term usage. There is a stand inside the package as well, which is generous (would have been so great if the stand were stylish too). Overall, I'm so happy with this product and would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product good protection works great with tempered glass protection
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, beautiful case. Yeah.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. It fits so well and it has a bumper. Which is required for me. Also, I've already gotten a ton of compliments on it. It's so beautiful! Highly recommended the case and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Ash Grosz

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. The design is so pretty on the phone- it shows the rose gold and looks good against the white on the front. It's also protective without feeling too bulky. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: A must have phone case
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best Phone case I’ve ever owned. I have probably dropped my phone 300 times in the past few years and it has never broken or shattered thankfully. I’ve gotten so many compliments on it the past few years, the design is so beautiful. I love the clear case because it adds a little extra beauty. An amazing value for what you get. I’d recommend this case 1000X over. I love that you don’t have to sacrifice style and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone case!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone case. It's easy to get on and off, very durable and after years of having it on my phone it has held up extremely well. I've dropped my phone multiple times and have yet to have the screen crack. It comes with a little stand that you can put your phone in to prop it up and watch videos on or on your counter to see a recipe. Great product at a great price! Highly recommend this product. I get compliments on it all the time. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous case and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits my iPhone7 plus perfectly. Easy accessibility to the buttons. A little thin, but that's kinda what I wanted. Doesn't add bulk to the phone at all. Very pretty. 1st day putting the case on, and I've already gotten compliments on it. Also, not sure If anyone's mentioned it, but I love how they send you a little stand for your iPhone as well. Just an awesome touch to an already satisfying buy. Definitely going to buy more cases from this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, elegant, great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. It looks sleek and elegant, but still feels sturdy and protective of my iPhone. All of the outlets and button covers are a perfect fit. It also comes with a stand, which I don't use often, but would be helpful if watching a video or something. All in all, a great phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of cases on amazon that would protect my phone at a reasonable price. I got this one because it is super cute and it had a lot of good reviews. You can't beat this 5 star item. One of the cool things I noticed is that if my phone is laying down on its back, the flash notification shines through the case it's really awesome looking!! If you're thinking about it, just get it! You will not be disappointed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chaya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pleased
customer_reviews.text: So pretty on the rose gold phone! I’m clumsy and drop my phone kind of regularly and I have small children who grab and drop it- so I was a little apprehensive of the protection it would give. It has held up pretty well, my glass screen cover did get a crack last night when my daughter dropped it but can’t say it’s the cases fault or not. I’ve had no issues with the white pieces flaking or peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I had a recent fall and although the phone face cracked a little in the bottom corners, the case was fine. It was a hard hit and not anything the case could have saved. The glass film I bought separately didn't cover this area which I think they should. Love the look of the case. Transparent to allow the Apple logo and color of the phone to come through. Feels good when held and lighter than my last case.
customer_reviews.author: Benedetta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Exactly as pictured. Quality materials!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Exactly as pictured. I’m writing this review months after I purchased it. I drop my phone once and a while, and I was extremely pleased at how well this case absorbed the abuse I put my phone through. It feels really nice in your hands. It is *slightly* bulky but I like that. It reassures me my over priced iPhone is protected. It shipped very fast and arrived it perfect condition. It also came with a free phone stand! I would recommend this to others and would purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This case is beautiful, it looks like a piece of lace on the back. It is pretty easy to put on and has strength to it, I didn't think so at first, but it is sturdier than I thought. The corners at smooth and overlap the edge enough to protect it. They even give you this gadget to help put it on, although I didn't know what it was for and did it myself. Lol I would definitely but from then again if I find more cases as attractive as this one. I would also recommend this product & company to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: I love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said that their case is peeling but mine is very durable. I love the design and I've dropped it a few times and there is no damage to my phone. I would definitely recommend this product. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this, beautiful design that does NOT wear off. I have dropped my phone several times and this has saved it! Grips the phone well without adding bulk like some cases do. I even purchased a low profile slide-in clip and kickstand case and this works great with those! I was so happy I was able to keep this design with it!
customer_reviews.author: fleet56

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not out and about a lot because of a young child at home, but my phone does occasionally get dropped on my hardwood floors. This case has protected it fine. I like that it's transparent with a cute design. Also, it's slim and not bulky at all. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Janene

customer_reviews.title: Pretty case that holds up well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice silicone case that does a great job protecting the corners of the phone. It's grippy enough that your hand doesn't slip but it can still slide into a pocket fairly easily. Controls are easy to use as well. I was worried the design would wear off but it doesn't! Silicone will 'brown' over time but design stays perfect. Looks great on my red phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: I just love this phone case
customer_reviews.text: I just love this phone case. It is very pretty and offers great protection for my phone. I think I would like more protection for my phone if I was hiking in the mountains but for everyday use this it the perfect case.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it!! Fits my iPhone 7 Plus perfectly. It's slimmer than the clear case I purchased with my phone and I actually like that better. Otherwise feels just like the more expensive plain one. Thanks so much for the free stand, great packaging and quick shipping! I may even get another Mosnovo just for fun, to change out, since you have so many beautiful ones to choose from! Then I can take advantage of the 10% off promo code included! I'm a happy girl! 😊
customer_reviews.author: aDiamondGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The case looks as described in pictures. For the most part it provides protection I also bought a tempered glass and a small part from the TG to the case around the edges are exposed. But I planned to be very careful with no direct hits hopefully and I should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda Bobo

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It is super cute and I have received many compliments on it. It also protects the phone pretty well. I've dropped my phone twice, once on concrete, and only had a little scuffed spot on the corner of the case where it hit. Only negative about it would be the design is printed on the outside of the case, so eventually it rubs off in places. I wish it was placed on the inside to prevent this, but it has still paid for itself with its protection from drops.
customer_reviews.author: Annalysia

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this model and this supplier to everyone who is looking for a phone cover. It looks great on my wife's phone and she continues to receive compliments when people see it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. This case is easy to get on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. This case is easy to get on and off my iPhone 7 Plus, and it does not muffle sound. The feminine yet durable case also complements and reveals the rose gold color of my iPhone. I combined this case with a tempered glass screen protector and my iPhone is well protected. Compared to other competitors selling expensive cases that hide the color of your iPhone and decrease sound quality, this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. My I-Phone is beautiful in it. It was amazingly inexpensive and easy to put on AND it protects my phone. Dropped it in a parking lot just last night. Can't believe I got this gorgeous case for so little money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in yellowish condition. Broken within 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the case, even though brand new, it was already in a yellowish color. The print of the pattern is on the outside of the case so if you want to buy a phone grip to stick onto the case, well, it will never stay on the pattern area. I used the case for 3 months and only dropped the phone a couple times on a smooth area from a table height and the case cracked at the bottom part of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It's so sharp looking. I love the clear look in the front around the edges. I really like that you can see the iphone and it's color. I was debating between this one and the one with no design on the back. I think either would be a great choice, but I'm glad I went outside of my comfort zone and got one with a little pizzazz. It's just enough, and not too flashy. My only complaint, which is super minimal, would be that the window opening for the apple logo on back isn't perfectly centered.
customer_reviews.author: airplanejane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. It's so beautiful and gives my iPhone a very pretty look. I was a little worried about how thin it was but it's actually really durable and does seem to protect my phone from damage. I've dropped it a few times and it's been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: This case is adorable and does a great job of protecting my iPhone 7 Plus. The lip around the front keeps my screen protected and the case is "grippy" enough to keep me from dropping my phone. I will definitely buy it again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Amarillas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, lets the color show through, helps give grip to the phone and I have dropped it and it protected it!
customer_reviews.author: AbbyL

customer_reviews.title: A+ from me!
customer_reviews.text: This phone case is exactly as described. It fit my phone perfectly and appears to be holding up well after several weeks of use. Some clear cases quickly turn brown from oils from skin. I'm sure it's inevitable, but it still looks good! I would definitely recommend to a friend. As a matter of fact, I bought a second case for my sister and she loves it, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lit Books 🔥 📚

customer_reviews.title: It's cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, it's not hard like plastic but has some kind of give to it. I've had it for 2 months now and none of the design has chipped off or anything! This is my first iPhone ever and I wanted it to be protected but cute at the same time and I've dropped my phone a couple times and nothing has happened. I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I’ve been using this case for six months now and still love it. Only downside is that since it’s clear, you can see that cat hair and crumbs find their way underneath the case somehow. Not a deal breaker. I just received this case and so far I love it! It keeps the camera and screen from resting on the table and it covers the lock and volume buttons without making them a pain in the butt to press. So far so good! It looks nice on my matte black phone and is very thin!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to receive my new 6+ iPhone case. It is clear and exactly what I wanted, since I purchased a rose colored phone and I wanted to be able to see the phone color. It is everything that was described and I LOVE the white design on the back. SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Dony Cooper

customer_reviews.title: MOSNOVO iPhone 7 Plus Case,
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. It's easy to hold, gives the phone just enough protection in case you drop it and I get a lot of compliments on the White Henna Mandala Floral Lace design on the back
customer_reviews.author: Pam Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten many compliments on the case and it's sturdy just as well. I've dropped my iphone 7 plus a few times and this thing has thankfully protected it! It's really very pretty too with the rose gold back of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: angmore

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 5 star review because I absolutely love this case I bought!!! Fits my iPhone 7 plus perfectly!! Definitely will buy again !!!
customer_reviews.author: aa13

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty design, durable clear material to protect your phone! Have had it for 3 months now, tried switching to another I ordered at the same time to switch it up but quickly went back to this cover. Will purchase again once this one goes bad. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Magi Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Have ordered twice. Great cases!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered twice, once in November and again in December. I liked the first case so much, I wanted another one in a different design. Love these cases! Beautiful, classy cases that provide great protection.
customer_reviews.author: SJG

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to put on and fits snugly
customer_reviews.text: This is a really lovely case that tastefully enhances the beauty of my phone. It is easy to put on and fits snugly, just as it should. I’ve only had the case of a couple of weeks, but have received several compliments and am completely satisfied with my purchase. I highly recommend both the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case and fits my iPhone 7 Plus nicely
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 7 Plus is currently wearing this case. If I'm going to review a cell phone case, I will wait until I've used it for a while. So, after a bit of use, the case fits really well and it's sturdy. The cutouts line up just right, and the graphics on the case I purchased are pretty amazing. I think I'm going to buy another case with a different design.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: This case was way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This case was way better than I expected. It is thick and strong without being too bulky and has protected my phone from many drops! Some of the design has started to wear (its painted on top of the plastic so you can feel the design with your fingertips), but it still looks fine (you can't really tell because of the intricate design) and it has held up quite nicely over the past 6 months or so of use. I've gotten many compliments on it because of the cute design and it's obvious it is a good phone protector. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: I love my Mosnovo case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It's pretty, and slim! The design on the back has held up over the past couple of months, and I use the stand that came with the case all the time for Netflix!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Waxler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a while for a case that was appealing and would also keep my phone safe. I'm so happy I stumbled across this case! It feels like my phone is safe and it's not too bulky. It also fits my 7plus perfectly. I'd definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As a super picky shopper
customer_reviews.text: As a super picky shopper, I have to say that this phone case is absolutely beautiful and durable. I've used it for 2 months now and it has exceeded my expectations. The quality of the case is excellent! I've dropped my phone a couple of times and the glass screen protector has not gotten broken. I love it even more than the other expensive cases that I've had. I would buy another one in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: LV Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. Excellent quality and durability, Very striking design, No problem with falls, 4 times to the ground without any damage The seller is very communicative and friendly
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my phone case today! It is so beautiful in person. Easy installation, holding it in the hand it has a great grip. (No sliding in the grip-some phones I have bought are “slippery” in the hand). It seems to be great/durable quality but I will have to review again since this is just my initial thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, durable. Beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CASE! The one I had before this was bulky and heavy, but this one is light weight and durable. Easy to take off and on my phone, and the design is REALLY pretty and printed to last. 10/10 would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this case. Definitely one of the best Ive ever purchased. It’s beautiful / the design gets me so many compliments Dropped my phone many times (iphone8) and the bumper never lets my screen crack Not slipper at all has a great grip on it Super worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this case for about two weeks now. So far, I love it. It looks beautiful on my rose gold iPhone 7 Plus and seems to protect the phone very well without a bulky look and feel. I woulfd like a little more protection for the camera though which sticks out a bit on this phone which is my reason for the 4 star rating. Don't get me wrong, there is some protection for the lens, I would just like a little more.
customer_reviews.author: pcat

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute case! It comes in fancy packaging & includes a kickstand for my phone too! It didnt even mention that surprise! It snapped on easily and feels sturdy but thin and my phone feels protected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brand Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, effective case
customer_reviews.text: Really nice case, not bulky, fits nicely in your hand. Remember that the case is transparent, you're not getting that blush background behind the henna design. You'll see whatever color iPhone that you own. The case is rubber on the sides and has a hard plastic back, so you have some cushion if your phone hits the ground. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: barmala

customer_reviews.title: Nice case with a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice case and it fits my daughter's 8Plus just fine. Protection on par with pretty much every other case out there and the case can be removed easily without any sagging/stretching, so far. Honestly, if you find a one-piece case you like nowadays it's hard to go wrong. As long as you're buying from Amazon and not paying 5x more from Best Buy or a wireless store.
customer_reviews.author: JRausta

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful on my new RED iPhone 7 plus
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful on my new RED iPhone 7 plus! I also like the sturdy bumper and that it keeps the camera and screen from touching level surfaces. The henna floral design frames the silver apple logo on the back of my phone beautifully. It's a simple case, but it does the job! Mosnovo also includes a free stand for your phone. I am using it at night when my phone doubles as my alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Josiebelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the mandala design and being able to see my phone (rose gold) through the case. Stylish case. I’m getting lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Napa_Jerae

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is beautiful. The design is slightly raised therefore the phone case is not slick. The case has a lip that protects the screen. I plan to purchase another one, as I like the first one so much. I highly recommend this case if you want an attractive, sturdy case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. Not too bulky, but definitely protects the back from scratches and the front from scratches and cracks with the bit of a bumper. Plus I love that my rose gold phone still shows through. My pop socket sticks to it perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Perfect fit! Definitely seems to be more about looks than durability but it'll do. Does not come with screen protectors. It's gorgeous though!
customer_reviews.author: James Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this case it is exactly what I was looking for. A pretty case; however, durable. Thick edges and slim profile. I personally suggest using a pop socket to help hold the phone, the case is nice, but the grip is missing. Perfect everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Best Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: I get many compliments on the design. I have a red Iphone so it looks perfect with the henna design. I have had this case for over a year. I drop my phone quite often, but not one break or scratch. It is well worth it for the price. I wish they made more masculine designs because I’d like to purchase one for my son because of the durability.
customer_reviews.author: FabMsA

customer_reviews.title: Super cute case from a great company
customer_reviews.text: I use this case with a silver iPhone 6 Plus. The white design is very cute with the silver phone. I like how the case slightly wraps around the front of the phone to protect your screen. The edges have a rubbery feel which makes for a secure grip when holding your phone. The company is very attentive to customers needs and answers all questions or concerns promptly. I would not hesitate to buy from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute case with great protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case 5 months ago and I love it. It's really cute and has barely yellowed. Every other clear case I've owned has yellowed much more by now. I am constantly dropping my phone and breaking chunks off my cases but this case has held up great! No cracks or chunks taken off the case and my phone has been completely protected. There are also these extra little bumps in in the corners on the back of the case so the design on the back has not been scratched up or chipped off. I definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rose Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case!
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat, it's very well packaged! I really liked that because it lets me know that the company wants to insure your products gets to you in a whole piece. The case sort of a rubbery feel, but I like that because I don't feel like the case will slip out of my hands. The design is gorgeous! I'm so happy with it! (:
customer_reviews.author: Marzzz

customer_reviews.title: Love my new case super pretty real shows off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my new case super pretty real shows off the color of your phone and it came with a cool stand so you can watch stuff with out holding your phone doesn't really protect the camera is the only down side but that's ok not a deal breaker for me I also ordered this last night around 10pm paid for one day shipping and got it the next day at 9am super fast!!
customer_reviews.author: kitten

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful protective case for my iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful protective case for my iPhone 7 Plus. The design is gorgeous and sets my phone apart from the other iPhones in the family - especially at family gatherings when cell phones are laying all over the place. The edges will protect my phone very nicely. Quick delivery and well worth the price for the lovely artwork.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ginex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good case I had mine for two years color changes after awhile but it’s not noticeable until you take the case off
customer_reviews.author: Monaè

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! It’s clear so you can still see the rose gold phone, looks like the phone is decaled! So far it’s done a good job protecting it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Looks exactly like the picture and looks great on my black iPhone. Also, it has a small lip around the edges to help keep the phone from directly touching a flat surface if sat down, say, on a table.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Unique. Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. It’s absolutely beautiful. So unique. Feels great in my hand. Quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: Great case worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Never had this brand nor a clear case. I like ''this one the better than any case I have had before. Come with a separate phone stand which was a plus. ** been a month and still holding up great! I love the clear sides. Always gotten cases that were black. I will always stick with this brand.*
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case it looks nice with the rose gold iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case it looks nice with the rose gold iPhone 7 plus. is different an elegant, I never write reviews. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Maite Aguililla

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone cover. The only problem was trying to decide which pattern to pick! It does a good job protecting the phone from the many times I drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Well done. Beautiful, raised design and the case is of better quality than I expected for the price. The packaging is impressive and includes a surprise stand for the phone that can be used in either portrait or landscape orientation. I would purchase again, and would definitely recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: yogeshvara

customer_reviews.title: Such a pretty and stylish design
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty and stylish design. Really sturdy. I have dropped my phone already and the case is still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Jeka

customer_reviews.title: I am grateful and beyond satisfied. I have zero complaints about the case
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: I originally listed less than 5 stars due to an error in the design. Today I received a NEW CASE PROPERLY DESIGNED, without notification or charge! For these reasons, I feel it is important to rate the product and company at 5 stars. They did not have to accommodate me in the way they chose to. I am grateful and beyond satisfied. I have zero complaints about the case, it works to protect my phone 100% as I drop my phone CONSTANTLY and have experienced zero damages. THANK YOU !
customer_reviews.author: porschea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly!! Covers the front lip enough and it's still thin but protected
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It fits my 7 plus perfectly. Although when I dropped my phone it cracked my screen protector (bought separately). That isn't a flaw, it's just that this case is a light protection case. All buttons work perfectly. Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable case
customer_reviews.text: I’ve dropped my phone several times with this case on it no damage done to phone case it durable I’ve had it almos 3 months and no complaints good case
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this phone case
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this phone case. Such an affordable price for great quality. Do not have to worry when dropping my phone as this case is durable. I personally do not like the bulkiness of an otterbox but do want the protection...have found that with this stylish case.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best durability for the best price
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t ask for a better phone case than this one, for the price. It’s stylish, was a great price and is way beyond what I thought it would be as far as durability goes. It’s held up excellently over the past 6 months of wear and rare. And with held a minimal of 5-10 drops. Hardly even a scuff mark.
customer_reviews.author: BreAnn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty case
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this case. The design on the back is really pretty. It is thin too which is nice - not so bulky,
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but never again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case in advance to have ready when my current one Needed to be retired. I’ve been using the case for only 3 months and the side lining is now separating from the bottom piece. Beautiful.... Not good quality at all!
customer_reviews.author: Andy K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case and it protects!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case. The design is great, its beautiful, but also very functional. I ALWAYS drop my phone and this case provides great protection. I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Chels D

customer_reviews.title: Protective & Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty!! So far it's been protective. I've dropped my phone at least 3 times on our stone floor since I've had it on my phone and although most things don't survive a fall onto the stone, my phone is still in-tact with a crack free screen!
customer_reviews.author: Megifog

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and excellent quality! I've used it for a year now and it has kept my phone in excellent condition, even though I've dropped it a few times. I recommend putting a screen protector on your phone, too. And it comes with a cute little stand, too. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Great case fits perfect and it looks nice. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My phone looks like it has lace on it
customer_reviews.text: I have people stop me and ask me where i got my cover, and the photo doesn't do it justice. My phone looks like it has lace on it, very girly, and yet its protective too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this case a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this case a lot! Not too bulky, but still offers protection to my phone. I use this case with a screen protector. The design is very pretty too! Just wish it covered the iPhone writing on the lower half.
customer_reviews.author: Archie Leitch

product_meta.title: MOSNOVO iPhone 7 Plus Case, iPhone 7 Plus Clear Case, White Henna Mandala Floral Lace Clear Design Transparent Plastic Back Case with TPU Bumper Protective Case Cover for iPhone 7 Plus
feature_bullets: [Compatible with Apple iPhone 7 Plus] PREMIUM PROTECTION - featuring two layers of protection: a shock-absorbing [TPU] frame that protects against drops, and a solid [PC] back plate that protects against scrapes, bumps and more.
ULTRA-CLEAR - slim, transparent protective bumper case body reveals and enhances the original color of the iPhone 7 Plus 2016.

MOSNOVO DESIGN - Perfect designed around Apple Logo to show it off with fashion trend of your iPhone 7 Plus back cover. Match perfectly for iPhone 7 Plus in Silver, Gold, Rose Gold, Jet Black. Every of our artworks are printed with odorless, certified scratch resistant ink and strong scratch-proof
Shock Absorbing + Scratch Resistant - Premium TPU Bumper + Hard Back Polycarbonate panel provides long-lasting protection from scratches and scrapes, easy grip and slim profile.
Easy access to all buttons and ports. While featuring raised bezel to life screen and camera off flat surface.
